tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE VocalLibrary (
  article_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  title VARCHAR(255),
  author VARCHAR(100),
  publication_date DATE,
  content TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE vocal_technique_articles (
  article_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  article_title VARCHAR(100),
  author VARCHAR(50),
  publication_date DATE,
  content TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE research_papers (
  paper_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  paper_title VARCHAR(100),
  author VARCHAR(50),
  publication_date DATE,
  abstract TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE Vocal_Technique_Articles (
  article_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  article_title VARCHAR(255),
  author VARCHAR(100),
  publication_date DATE,
  category VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE Research_Papers (
  paper_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  paper_title VARCHAR(255),
  author VARCHAR(100),
  publication_date DATE,
  topic VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE Singers (
  singer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  singer_name VARCHAR(100),
  vocal_range VARCHAR(50),
  experience_years INT,
  teacher VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE Singer_Library (
  library_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  singer_id INT,
  article_id INT,
  paper_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (singer_id) REFERENCES Singers(singer_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (article_id) REFERENCES Vocal_Technique_Articles(article_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (paper_id) REFERENCES Research_Papers(paper_id)
);

CREATE TABLE articles (
    article_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    title VARCHAR(255),
    author VARCHAR(255),
    publication_date DATE,
    content TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE research_papers (
    paper_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    title VARCHAR(255),
    authors TEXT,
    publication_date DATE,
    abstract TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE article_topics (
    article_id INT,
    topic_id INT,
    PRIMARY KEY (article_id, topic_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (article_id) REFERENCES articles(article_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (topic_id) REFERENCES topics(topic_id)
);
